remarks: Lemma for transfinite recursion.  Here we compute the value of ` recs ` (the union of all acceptable functions).  (Contributed by NM, 17-Aug-1994.)
statement:
tfrlem.1 $e |- A = { f | E. x e. On ( f Fn x /\ A. y e. x ( f ` y ) = ( F ` ( f |` y ) ) ) } $.
tfrlem9 $p |- ( B e. dom recs ( F ) -> ( recs ( F ) ` B ) = ( F ` ( recs ( F ) |` B ) ) ) $.
$d B f x y $.
$d F f x y $.
$d f x y $.
